column4: hey people, anyone out there able to direct a complete novice in getting started with mysql
You might want to check Jimmyr's youtube channel. He's got video tutorials on that kind of thing
also, I think his website is www.jimmyr.com
There also might be something about mysql on a webhosing unleashed post that has over 100 links to open courseware in the IT field. There's some of it that's from MIT as well.
